attributes.action: Delay the implementation of the current local Post Office closure programme by one to two  years to allow for greater consultation with residents and those affected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From the many petitions and protests on specific local post offices it is obvious that this programme is causing disquiet to many thousands of people.   The elderly and infirm in particualar who do not have their own transport feel disadvantaged in that an important part of the access to necessary services is being removed
